page.title: 10HOME LIFE IN BURSCOUGH
page.content: Most people in our area live in family groups with approx.5 people.They live in either a house,flat or bungalow. Lots of people bring their hobbies home eg:Brownies and Cubs(groups for young people)bring "badge"work home. Some people do their hobbies at home eg:stamp collecting and model making. In summer people do outdoor activities eg.walking and gardening. In winter they stay indoors and knit, sew,read,play games and watch T.V. Families tend to be very close,Mothers usually cook the meals and do housework but some also go out to work.Most Fathers go out to work and help in the home. Pre-school children stay at home or go to playgroup whilst older children go to school. Most families have 2 meals together a day. Many cook and eat in the kitchen.
